content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mine at position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of Burner Mining Drill (position x=16.0 y=0.0), Wooden Chest (position x=15.5 y=-1.5), and PipeGroup (position x=17.5 y=-0.5)

#### Chemical Plant at position(20.5, 0.5)
Consists of Chemical Plant (position x=20.5 y=0.5), Oil Refinery (position x=25.5 y=0.5), Pumpjack (position x=26.5 y=40.5), PipeGroup connecting Oil Refinery to Chemical Plant (position x=18.5 y=-2.5), PipeGroup connecting Pumpjack to Oil Refinery (position x=26.5 y=3.5), Burner Inserter (position x=18.5 y=0.5), and Small Electric Pole (position x=22.5 y=0.5)

#### Electricity Generation and Distribution
Consists of Small Electric Pole (position x=22.5 y=0.5), (position x=26.5 y=38.5), (position x=-44.5 y=68.5), and ElectricityGroup (id=19595, poles=[(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=2.5,y=7.5),(x=31.5,y=7.5),...,(x=-44.5,y=68.5),(x=-40.5,y=68.5),(x=-36.5,y=68.5)])

#### Steam Engine at position(10.5, 0.5)
Consists of Steam Engine (position x=10.5 y=0.5), Boiler (position x=13.5 y=3.0), Small Electric Pole (position x=10.5 y=-1.5), Small Electric Pole (position x=10.5 y=2.5), PipeGroup connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler (position x=-8.5 y=-0.5), and PipeGroup connecting Boiler to Steam Engine (position x=13.5 y=0.5)

#### Water Supply System
Consists of Offshore Pump (position x=-9.5 y=-0.5), PipeGroup (position x=-8.5 y=-0.5)

#### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of Assembling Machine (position x=0.5 y=0.5), Stone Furnace (position x=5.0 y=0.0), and ElectricityGroup connecting Steam Engine to Assembling Machine (id=19595, poles=[(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=2.5,y=7.5),(x=31.5,y=7.5),...,(x=-44.5,y=68.5),(x=-40.5,y=68.5),(x=-36.5,y=68.5)])

#### Copper Ore Mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of Electric Mining Drill (position x=-46.5 y=70.5), Wooden Chest (position x=-46.5 y=68.5), and ElectricityGroup connecting Steam Engine to Electric Mining Drill (id=19595, poles=[(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=2.5,y=7.5),(x=31.5,y=7.5),...,(x=-44.5,y=68.5),(x=-40.5,y=68.5),(x=-36.5,y=68.5)])

### ERROR TIPS
- Errors when attempting to place an entity at a position that is occupied by another entity:
  - Ensure the target position is clear before attempting to place an entity.
- Errors when attempting to place an entity that is too far away:
  - Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.
- Errors when a machine is not receiving electricity:
  - Ensure the machine is properly connected to a power source.
- Errors when a chemical plant or other machine is missing required resources:
  - Ensure the required resources are available and properly connected to the machine.
- Errors when harvesting resources that are out of reach:
  - Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
- Errors when attempting to research a technology that is already researched:
  - Check the current research status before attempting to set a new research topic.
- Errors when attempting to get a specific entity at a position that does not exist:
  - Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.
- Errors when a chest at a drop position is full:
  - Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
- Errors when a Burn
